questList.questDescription: The Shadow King has corrupted the Grove Stalkers, turning them into a menace for the forest's denizens. Clear the Enchanted Grove of this twisted group to restore peace.
The Mystic Entanglers know the secrets of the forest and could be valuable allies. Convince them to join your cause against the Shadow King.
Abominations have emerged from the shadows, threatening the balance of the Enchanted Grove. Eliminate them to lift the gloom they have cast over the land.
The Frostbound Horde guards the secrets of the Crystal Peaks. Their icy grip must be broken to advance further in your quest.
The Mountain Sentinels are formidable defenders of the peaks. Convince them to aid you in your battle against the Shadow King's forces.
The Icy Predators threaten to encase the Crystal Peaks in eternal frost. Overcome them to restore the warmth and safety of the land.
The Infernal Guardians stand as the first line of defense for the Shadow King. Their defeat will weaken his hold on the Shadowed Abyss.
The Dark Summoners channel dark energies to empower the Shadow King. Stopping them will disrupt his plans and bring you closer to victory.

questList.questName: Final Confrontation with the Shadow King
questList.questDescription: The fate of Mystic Lands rests on this final battle. Defeat the Shadow King to bring light back to the realm and end his reign of darkness.
